content: As an AI language model, I cannot make predictions or guesses about the performance of any team or individual players, as it depends on various factors, including their current form, health, and opposition teams. However, it is not uncommon for teams to have new stars emerge each season, especially with a roster that is constantly evolving. The Calgary Stampeders have a strong history of developing young talent and providing opportunities for players to shine. It will be exciting to see if any new players can make an impact this season and contribute to the team's success.
